name: Right Before The End
description:
As working on the main project (Endomorium) had to take a short leave, a short game jam was advised in its absence. Being a huge fan of RPGs, it was natural to cook up a plan akin, and test out some features and techniques. The game seen above is the representation of that.

It could be called the spiritual successor of another prototype called FLD (free to download for PC).

Installation instructions:

1) Extract file, and send to phone (android ETC2 only)
2) Open directly or via Chrome and install

3) Launch the game

In case the install fails:

1) Enable developer mode (generally follow the steps below, dependable on device, Google should be used for more info)

 --> Go to "Settings", then tap "About device" or "About phone".

 --> Scroll down, then tap "Build number" seven times. Depending on your device and operating system, you may need to tap "Software information", then tap "Build number" seven times.

 --> Enter your pattern, PIN or password to enable the Developer options menu (if prompted).

2) Enable USB tethering mode and connect your device to your PC (via USB)

3) Launch install.bat. It may or may not work, as it requires ADB to work (which might need some additional software installation)

4) Launch the game.
